about_the_game:
Savage Suzerain Adventure Deck


Newly updated Continuum Edition!

Savage Worlds is a really fun rules system - which is why we created Savage Suzerain. One of the things about Savage Worlds that's really really fun is the use of adventure deck cards, to add a little spice to each session. Well, now you can have the Savage Suzerain Adventure Deck, custom built to add extra zing to your adventurers, heroes and demigods.

Beautifully illustrated with glorious full-color high resolution art, they'll add a bit of class to any gaming table... and add 54 (+9 bonus cards) cool effects to the characters. A one-off use of a power from the Patron God of Weather? I'll take that lightning strike! From Divine Intervention to Dumb Luck, Temporary Transcendence to a little Narrative License, we've got it all.

Product Contains: An 11 page reference manual with 63 cards. This is a high art, full color product - admit it, you wouldn't want your deck of cards to be any other way.

Converted by: Kerry Harrison

Released on September 23, 2018. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.6 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset.
